title: williamgalvin.me
description: The portfolio website you're viewing right now!

title: SAAS Template
description: The base template to all my SAAS projects. A clean, fast, reliable, and secure boilerplate for any online software product. Handles everything from basic UI to user authentication and database queries.

title: M.E.K Breakfast House
description: A production website for a local breakfast restaurant. Designed and built on request after the satisfaction of a previous website I made for their other restaurant. ** Source code not provided for privacy reasons **

title: Diction
description: A mobile application to find the definition of words and save them for future use. Inspired by reading philisophical texts and running into words I didn't know but would be useful to learn.
